review: Dr. Tamiz & Dr. Bhagyalakshmi, I wanted to take a moment to express my sincere gratitude for your exceptional dentistry skills and care during my recent root canal treatment for (Lower 31) and tooth extraction (Lower 33). Your expertise, precision, and dedication to ensuring my comfort throughout the procedure were truly remarkable. Thanks to your skillful hands and compassionate approach, I felt at ease every step of the way. I am immensely grateful for the excellent care you provided, and I cannot thank you enough for restoring my dental health with such professionalism and kindness.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Tamil is an expert Endodontist teamed up with Dr Bhagyashree who is crown specialist. Together they rectified all the post rct issues I had as a result of getting treatment from various other dentists who were given 5 star ratings in this site. The war time is less, the rct was done is 20 mins flawlessly with ease n there was no pain or any post treatment or swelling. The wait time fr crown was also 1.5 days. Issues with my 3 teeth got treated within a week. The pricing is reasonable and clinic is well equipped with all necessary devices n all devices are also sterilised after every patient leaves. I highly recommend this clinic
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback mam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The doctor was very kind and understanding, I went for root canal treatment and To be honest I was very scared thinking about the whole procedure but then all my fear is gone after the doctor explanation about how the procedure will go painless. And  you know what it was really painless instead I was very comfortable , The doctor and staff there are very friendly. They make  me feel like I knew them for decades. I really appreciate the doctor and staffs.
   For those thinking of doing root canal treatment and are scared like me should not have second thoughts and definitely go to roots and crowns for treatment. Believe me overall procedure was painless as The doctor is a professional doctor and he  handled the patient with care. Worth of money. 
   Thank you very much roots and crowns doctor and staff.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Had visited Dr Tamilahaghan  for fixing my crown that had broken and gotten dislodged. His expertise is assessing the situation  and experienced consult was great and I see that the ceramic crowns fixed at his clinic are much better than the ones that I previously had. 

While at the clinic I had made enquiries about teeth whitening and Dr Tamil was again clear in his explanations, comparisons and suggestions for the right procedure for me.

Very satisfied with the technical expertise and patient care at the clinic & very satisfied with the outcome- both crown replacement and teeth whitening.

Highly recommended .
reply_text: Thanks for your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am very much thankful to Dr. Tamilazhagan  for the treatment to relive my dental pain. The approach was very professional and comfortable. Though I was worrying, it will take much longer time during this pandemic, but he made me comfortable with quick appointments. I was very much interested with the ambiance of the clinic, with state of art equipment's especially X-ray attached diagnostic chair and all sterilized instruments up to international standards with X-ray pf free of cost.
Above all, I and my family members are much thankful to Dr. Tamilazhagan  because he has taken much risk in this Covid-19 pandemic without bothering about their health, relived me from the pain and agony. 
Any other clients can visit the clinic and can have free consultation at any time. 

Thanks.

review:
The entire team of Roots and Crowns are very dedicated to their patients , 
I have been here for Root canal treatment , ****** ********** ** ** ****** ** *** ***** ,
Treatment is highly cost effect and very professional ,
I had two of my decayed tooth filled up and an overall oral cleaning ,
The assistant doctors have paid to great details in systematically cleaning and filling up deep fissures ,
They are extremely patient friendly,  at each step they educated me on the science behind the problem ,
We appreciate doctors who take time to explain the patient in lay man terms the scientific cause and consequences of the problem.
Very good ambience and waiting hall , very hygienic and located in the prime area , so it's very easy to reach .
I highly recommend this clinic to all dental patients looking for good treatment with cost effectiveness ,
God bless the team.
